briefTitle: Safety of Ovarian Stimulation With Letrozole and Gonadotropins in Breast Cancer Patients
officialTitle: Safety of Ovarian Stimulation With Letrozole and Gonadotropins in Breast Cancer Patients Undergoing Embryo or Oocyte Cryopreservation: A Prospective Controlled Follow up Study
primaryOutcomeMeasure: Breast cancer relapse free survival after ovarian stimulation
eligibilityCriteria:
Inclusion Criteria:

* Age 18-45 years
* Biopsy proven breast cancer
* No prior chemotherapy or oophorectomy
* Regular menstrual cycles
* Normal basal FSH and estradiol

Exclusion Criteria:

* Stage 4 breast cancer
